Class EventBus

java.lang.Object
events.EventBus
public class EventBus extends Object
Week 11-04: EventBus - Central event dispatcher (Observer Pattern) ✅ SOLUTION: Decouples event publishers from listeners The EventBus is the central hub for all game events. - Publishers call publish(event) to broadcast events - Listeners register via subscribe() to receive events - EventBus notifies all registered listeners when events occur Benefits: - Complete decoupling: Publishers don't know about listeners - Easy to add new event types (just create new GameEvent subclass) - Easy to add new listeners (just implement GameEventListener) - Follows Observer Pattern and Open/Closed Principle Implementation Note: Uses Singleton pattern for global access throughout the game.
